ygData.subject: Re: Pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: So does this apply to all skills or just pottery? huh? Lanoche(Karana, Magician) ... From: robert nunez  To:
ygData.messageBody:
So does this apply to all skills or just pottery?







huh?

Lanoche(Karana, Magician)
----- Original Message -----
From: robert nunez <homenunez@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 11:43 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Pottery


> From: "robert nunez" <homenunez@...>
>
> Man r u serious?
> Why are they doing this thing?Do they not realize that we take on these
> skills which not only take s a ton away from time away from hunting but
now
> these skills are just a complete waste of time
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Thulgar <thulgar@...>
> To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Sent: Sunday, July 25, 1999 11:36 AM
> Subject: [EQCheats] Pottery
>
>
> > WARNING TEST SERVER has changed the Pottery costs, and is NOT profitable
> at all, details below.
> >
> > With a CHA 85
> >
> > now before
> >
> > Sketch 1pp 6sp 1cp --------- 1sp 1cp
> > water 1sp 1cp --------------- 1sp 1cp
> > Clay 4sp 3cp ----------------- 4sp 3cp
> > Sheet 4sp 3cp ---------------- 4sp 3cp
> >
> > As you can see this is not going to go over to well, this increase is
WAY
> to much, considering the
> > sales of a pie tin after fired is only 6 gp 5 sp 7 cp. Get your pottery
> and money now, regular
> > servers are going to be updated this Tuesday...
> >
>
